trans-unit.source: Provides event data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs"></xref> event that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs*> method.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados de eventos para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs"> </xref> evento que é utilizado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs*>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartVerbsEventArgs class represents the event data for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs> event, which occurs when the Web Parts verbs are created for a zone that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WebPartVerbsEventArgs representa os dados do evento para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs>evento, que ocorre quando são criados os verbos de peças Web para uma zona que derive da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs>

trans-unit.source: Web Parts verbs represent actions that users can perform in the user interface (UI) of a Web Parts page, such as minimizing, closing, or restoring controls; adding controls to a page; or canceling an action.
trans-unit.target: Verbos de peças Web representam as ações que os utilizadores podem realizar na interface de utilizador (UI) de uma página de peças Web, como minimizando, fechar ou restaurar controlos; adicionar controlos para uma página; ou cancelar uma ação.

trans-unit.source: Verbs can appear in both the header and footer areas of a zone, and there are both standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set, and custom verbs that can be added by developers.
trans-unit.target: Podem aparecer verbos nas áreas de cabeçalho e rodapé de uma zona e existem verbos padrão fornecidos com o conjunto de controlo de peças Web e verbos personalizados que podem ser adicionados pelos programadores.

trans-unit.source: A verb is represented in the UI by a clickable object, which you can set to appear as a hyperlink, an image, or a button, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um verbo é representado na IU por um objeto clicável, que pode configurar aparecer como uma hiperligação, uma imagem ou um botão, pelo utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> zone provides a standard set of verbs that get rendered in a Web Parts control's verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>zona fornece um conjunto padrão de verbos obter apresentados no menu de verbos de um controlo de peças Web.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: A custom Web Parts zone, or a Web Parts control inside a Web Parts zone, can add additional verbs to the menu.
trans-unit.target: Uma zona de peças Web personalizada ou um controlo de peças Web dentro de uma zona de peças Web, pode adicionar verbos adicionais ao menu.

trans-unit.source: A control in a Web Parts zone can add verbs to the control's verbs menu by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class and overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um controlo numa zona de peças Web pode adicionar verbos ao menu de verbos do controlo herdar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>base classe e substituir a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If the control does not inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class, you can add a new verb by implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface, and then overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se o controlo não herda do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>classe, base pode adicionar um verbo novo implementando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable>interface e, em seguida, substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method allows derived classes to override the event without attaching a delegate to it.
trans-unit.target: Protegido <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método permite derivada classes para substituir o evento sem anexar um delegado ao mesmo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A derived class must always call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A> method of the base class to ensure that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe derivada sempre tem de chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>método da classe base para garantir que os delegados registados recebem o evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor and it creates an empty object.
trans-unit.target: Este é o construtor predefinido e cria um objeto vazio.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified Web Parts verb collection.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs"> </xref> classe através da coleção de verbo peças Web especificada.

trans-unit.source: When using this constructor, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs.Verbs%2A> property is set to the Web Parts verb collection specified in the `verbs` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando utilizar este construtor, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs.Verbs%2A>propriedade está definida para a coleção de verbo peças Web especificada a `verbs` parâmetro.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs.Verbs%2A>
Uma coleção de verbo peças Web.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Web Parts verbs used in the event data.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os verbos de peças Web de eventos utilizado dados.

trans-unit.source: Initially, this property is set by specifying a Web Parts verb collection in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Inicialmente, esta propriedade for definida, especificando uma coleção de peças Web verbo no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection%29>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection%29>
